short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Your WhatsApp Polls To Excel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Your WhatsApp Polls to Excel is a lightweight and easy-to-use Chrome extension that helps you save and analyze poll results directly from WhatsApp Web. With just one click, you can export poll questions, responses, and voter details into an organized Excel/CSV file for further use.

Key Features:
âœ… Adds an Export button to WhatsApp Web polls.
âœ… Exports poll results, including:

The poll name and options
Voter names and phone numbers
Total votes for each option
âœ… Saves data as a clean, easy-to-use Excel (CSV) file.
âœ… No data is collected or stored â€” everything happens locally on your device.

How to Use:
- Open WhatsApp Web in your browser.
- Navigate to any poll you want to export.
- Click the Export button added by this extension.
- Download and open the CSV file in Excel or any spreadsheet software.
- Perfect for group admins, organizers, or anyone who needs to analyze poll responses efficiently!
